== Manakunnam (CT) (628017) ==

Manakunnam (CT) is a town in the [[Kanayannur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 24.86 sq. km. and harbouring 9716 households with total population of 39538 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 210 km. Male population is 19375 and female population is 20163. Scheduled Caste population is 3428 and Scheduled Tribes population is 237. Census Location Code of the town is 628017<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 12 km. Railway station is at Thrippunithura at a distance of 5 km.
